verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto Aaron <WH175> and to his sons <WH1121>, that they separate <WH5144> themselves from the holy things <WH6944> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and that they profane <WH2490> not my holy <WH6944> name <WH8034> in those things which they hallow <WH6942> unto me: I am the LORD <WH3068>.

Say <WH559> unto them, Whosoever <WH376> he be of all your seed <WH2233> among your generations <WH1755>, that goeth <WH7126> unto the holy things <WH6944>, which the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> hallow <WH6942> unto the LORD <WH3068>, having his uncleanness <WH2932> upon him, that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from my presence <WH6440>: I am the LORD <WH3068>.

What man soever <WH376> of the seed <WH2233> of Aaron <WH175> is a leper <WH6879>, or hath a running issue <WH2100>; he shall not eat <WH398> of the holy things <WH6944>, until he be clean <WH2891>. And whoso toucheth <WH5060> any thing that is unclean <WH2931> by the dead <WH5315>, or a man <WH376> whose seed <WH2233> <WH7902> goeth <WH3318> from him;

Or whosoever <WH376> toucheth <WH5060> any creeping thing <WH8318>, whereby he may be made unclean <WH2930>, or a man <WH120> of whom he may take uncleanness <WH2930>, whatsoever uncleanness <WH2932> he hath;

The soul <WH5315> which hath touched <WH5060> any such shall be unclean <WH2930> until even <WH6153>, and shall not eat <WH398> of the holy things <WH6944>, unless <WH518> he wash <WH7364> his flesh <WH1320> with water <WH4325>.
And when the sun <WH8121> is down <WH935>, he shall be clean <WH2891>, and shall afterward <WH310> eat <WH398> of the holy things <WH6944>; because it is his food <WH3899>.
That which dieth of itself <WH5038>, or is torn <WH2966> with beasts, he shall not eat <WH398> to defile <WH2930> himself therewith: I am the LORD <WH3068>.

They shall therefore keep <WH8104> mine ordinance <WH4931>, lest they bear <WH5375> sin <WH2399> for it, and die <WH4191> therefore, if they profane <WH2490> it: I the LORD <WH3068> do sanctify <WH6942> them.
There shall no stranger <WH2114> eat <WH398> of the holy thing <WH6944>: a sojourner <WH8453> of the priest <WH3548>, or an hired servant <WH7916>, shall not eat <WH398> of the holy thing <WH6944>.

But if the priest <WH3548> buy <WH7069> any soul <WH5315> with <WH7075> his money <WH3701>, he shall eat <WH398> of it, and he that is born <WH3211> in his house <WH1004>: they shall eat <WH398> of his meat <WH3899>.
If the priest's <WH3548> daughter <WH1323> also be married unto a stranger <WH376> <WH2114>, she may not eat <WH398> of an offering <WH8641> of the holy things <WH6944>.

But if the priest's <WH3548> daughter <WH1323> be a widow <WH490>, or divorced <WH1644>, and have no child <WH2233>, and is returned <WH7725> unto her father's <WH1> house <WH1004>, as in her youth <WH5271>, she shall eat <WH398> of her father's <WH1> meat <WH3899>: but there shall no stranger <WH2114> eat <WH398> thereof.

¶ And if a man <WH376> eat <WH398> of the holy thing <WH6944> unwittingly <WH7684>, then he shall put <WH3254> the fifth <WH2549> part thereof unto it, and shall give <WH5414> it unto the priest <WH3548> with the holy thing <WH6944>.
And they shall not profane <WH2490> the holy things <WH6944> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, which they offer <WH7311> unto the LORD <WH3068>;
Or suffer them to bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of trespass <WH819>, when they eat <WH398> their holy things <WH6944>: for I the LORD <WH3068> do sanctify <WH6942> them.
¶ And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto Aaron <WH175>, and to his sons <WH1121>, and unto all the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them, Whatsoever <WH376> he be of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, or of the strangers <WH1616> in Israel <WH3478>, that will offer <WH7126> his oblation <WH7133> for all his vows <WH5088>, and for all his freewill offerings <WH5071>, which they will offer <WH7126> unto the LORD <WH3068> for a burnt offering <WH5930>;
Ye shall offer at your own will <WH7522> a male <WH2145> without blemish <WH8549>, of the beeves <WH1241>, of the sheep <WH3775>, or of the goats <WH5795>.
But whatsoever hath a blemish <WH3971>, that shall ye not offer <WH7126>: for it shall not be acceptable <WH7522> for you.

And whosoever <WH376> offereth <WH7126> a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002> unto the LORD <WH3068> to accomplish <WH6381> his vow <WH5088>, or a freewill offering <WH5071> in beeves <WH1241> or sheep <WH6629>, it shall be perfect <WH8549> to be accepted <WH7522>; there shall be no blemish <WH3971> therein.

Blind <WH5788>, or broken <WH7665>, or maimed <WH2782>, or having a wen <WH2990>, or scurvy <WH1618>, or scabbed <WH3217>, ye shall not offer <WH7126> these unto the LORD <WH3068>, nor make <WH5414> an offering by fire <WH801> of them upon the altar <WH4196> unto the LORD <WH3068>.

Either a bullock <WH7794> or a lamb <WH7716> that hath any thing superfluous <WH8311> or lacking in his parts <WH7038>, that mayest thou offer <WH6213> for a freewill offering <WH5071>; but for a vow <WH5088> it shall not be accepted <WH7521>.

Ye shall not offer <WH7126> unto the LORD <WH3068> that which is bruised <WH4600>, or crushed <WH3807>, or broken <WH5423>, or cut <WH3772>; neither shall ye make <WH6213> any offering thereof in your land <WH776>.

Neither from a stranger's <WH5236> hand <WH3027> <WH1121> shall ye offer <WH7126> the bread <WH3899> of your God <WH430> of any of these; because their corruption <WH4893> is in them, and blemishes <WH3971> be in them: they shall not be accepted <WH7521> for you.
¶ And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

When a bullock <WH7794>, or a sheep <WH3775>, or a goat <WH5795>, is brought forth <WH3205>, then it shall be seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> under the dam <WH517>; and from the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> and thenceforth <WH1973> it shall be accepted <WH7521> for an offering <WH7133> made by fire <WH801> unto the LORD <WH3068>.
And whether it be cow <WH7794> or ewe <WH7716>, ye shall not kill <WH7819> it and her young <WH1121> both in one <WH259> day <WH3117>.
And when ye will offer <WH2076> a sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426> unto the LORD <WH3068>, offer <WH2076> it at your own will <WH7522>.
On the same day <WH3117> it shall be eaten up <WH398>; ye shall leave <WH3498> none of it until the morrow <WH1242>: I am the LORD <WH3068>.
Therefore shall ye keep <WH8104> my commandments <WH4687>, and do <WH6213> them: I am the LORD <WH3068>.

Neither shall ye profane <WH2490> my holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>; but I will be hallowed <WH6942> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: I am the LORD <WH3068> which hallow <WH6942> you,
That brought you out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, to be your God <WH430>: I am the LORD <WH3068>.
